name: cordova-add-whitelist-app-availability-info-plist-cpn
author: Brian Nguyen <ngxtri@gmail.com> (https://github.com/brian3t)
description: Cordova / PhoneGap Plugin to add whitelist to the Info.plist file in order to use AppAvailability on the iOS 9.2 and above changes. For launching carpoolnow app
